{{codepointer|r=Strife}} '''A_Burnination'''
(no parameters)
Plays the sound "world/largefire" on the Voice channel. Spawns {{Class|PhosphorousFire}} within 31 map units from the originating actor. If the spot picked has a height outside of actor's {{Property|MaxStepHeight}} then the actor will be spawned in the same location as the caller. The new actors are always spawned 4 units above the calling actor.
Spawned actors will have {{Flag|DROPPED}} set which will cause this function to be disabled for them. They also have their {{Property|ReactionTime}} set to some value 2-5. Their x/y velocities will be set to some value 0-7 relative to the calling actor's velocity.
{{Note|This function differs slightly from vanilla Strife. In vanilla the flames are spawned lop-sided since it doesn't use negative offsets.}}
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|PhosphorousFire}} and derived classes.
